subject: Purchasing of raw materials
body:
Purchasing of raw materials for production
Hello,
I need your assistance in the purchase of a raw material for production.
Please get back to me for a detailed business discussion and possible collaboration.
I look forward to your feedback.
Best regards
Contact me here please
(
jw6851336@gmail.com
 )
Research And Development Department
Jerry Waildon

subject: Re:   Purchasing of raw materials
body:
Hello Jerry,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about the purchasing of raw materials for production. Could you please provide me with some details about the specific raw materials you are looking to purchase? Additionally, it would be helpful to know what quantity you require and any specific requirements or specifications.

I look forward to hearing back from you and discussing this further.

Best wishes,
Tracey
